descriptionHtml:
[i][font=Georgia][size=3]this is a preset of my character if you want her to look exactly like she does in the screenshots install the mods listed below:[/size][/font][/i]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/NqcNIAb.png[/img]
[i][b]
[color=#980000][size=4][u]Required[/u]
[/size][/color]
(Choose only one) Link NSFW
[url=http://www.loverslab.com/topic/11281-lovergirls-race-followers/page-20]LovergirlRace[/url]-Dawngaurd (Account Required)
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/file/0mmopom3oc0a4ro/Lovergirl+Race+v1.0.7.rar]LovergirlRace[/url]-Non Dawngaurd

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59661/?]Hepsy hair[/url]

[url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/3148-yevmods-makeup-pack-ymmp-2k-4k/]YevModsMakeup[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48705/?]RacemenuOverlayCompilation[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49749/?]WingTattoo[/url]

[u]Optional file[/u]

[size=3]Oily skin (if you want the "Shiny skin")
[/size]
[color=#980000]Recommended[/color]

if you want her to look exactly like she does in the screenshots you will have to download: 
[size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D51602&pUp=1]Fair Skin Complexion[/url][/size] and overwrite the LoverGirl[size=3] files located in: [/size]C:\Users\Michael\Documents\Mod Organizer\mods\Lovergirl\textures\BSnake\Lovergirl Race

Now this is where it gets a little complicated if you're not very experienced with modding. you will need to replace the lovergirl tintmasks with the tintmasks from the mod [/b][/i][i][b][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73853/?]pure skin textures[/url] [/size][/b][/i][i][b][size=2]or if you like you can simply use the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73853/?]pure skin textures[/url] instead of the fair skin textures.[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73853/?]
[/url] 
[size=3]If you have any problems please let me know and don't forget to upload [u]screenshots![/u] if you like my character. [/size]
[size=4]
[u]Download Manually[/u][/size][/b][/i]
author: Michaelspicer16
